SEARCH
Modul de.hitec.nhplus
Package de.hitec.nhplus.controller

Klasse AllPatientController

java.lang.Object
de.hitec.nhplus.controller.AllPatientController
public class AllPatientController extends Object
The AllPatientController contains the entire logic of the patient view. It determines which data is displayed and how to react to events.

  • Methodendetails

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      When initialize() gets called, all fields are already initialized. For example from the FXMLLoader after loading an FXML-File. At this point of the lifecycle of the Controller, the fields can be accessed and configured.

    • handleOnEditFirstname

      public void handleOnEditFirstname(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn.CellEditEvent<Patient,String> event)
      When a cell of the column with first names was changed, this method will be called, to persist the change.
      Parameter:
      event - Event including the changed object and the change.

    • handleOnEditSurname

      public void handleOnEditSurname(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn.CellEditEvent<Patient,String> event)
      When a cell of the column with surnames was changed, this method will be called, to persist the change.
      Parameter:
      event - Event including the changed object and the change.

    • handleOnEditDateOfBirth

      public void handleOnEditDateOfBirth(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn.CellEditEvent<Patient,String> event)
      When a cell of the column with dates of birth was changed, this method will be called, to persist the change.
      Parameter:
      event - Event including the changed object and the change.

    • handleOnEditCareLevel

      public void handleOnEditCareLevel(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn.CellEditEvent<Patient,String> event)
      When a cell of the column with care levels was changed, this method will be called, to persist the change.

      event - Event including the changed object and the change.

    • handleOnEditRoomNumber

      public void handleOnEditRoomNumber(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn.CellEditEvent<Patient,String> event)
      When a cell of the column with room numbers was changed, this method will be called, to persist the change.
      Parameter:
      event - Event including the changed object and the change.

    • doUpdate

      private void doUpdate(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn.CellEditEvent<Patient,String> event)
      Updates a patient by calling the method update() of PatientDao.
      Parameter:
      event - Event including the changed object and the change.

    • readAllAndShowInTableView

      private void readAllAndShowInTableView()
      Reloads all patients to the table by clearing the list of all patients and filling it again by all persisted patients, delivered by PatientDao.

    • handleLock

      public void handleLock()
      This method handles the locking of a patient. When a patient is locked, they can no longer be edited and will be deleted after 10 years. This action is irreversible. The method first creates a confirmation dialog to ensure that the user really wants to lock the patient. If the user confirms, the selected patient is removed from the list and the 'lockPatient' method of the PatientDao is called with the patient ID as a parameter.

    • handleAdd

      public void handleAdd()
      This method handles the events fired by the button to add a patient. It collects the data from the TextFields, creates an object of class Patient of it and passes the object to PatientDao to persist the data.

    • handleExport

      public void handleExport()
      This method handles the events fired by the button to export a patient's data. It retrieves the selected Patient from the TableView, and if a patient is selected, it calls the method to export the patient's data. The export format can is "CSV".

    • handleSelectAll

      public void handleSelectAll()

    • clearTextfields

      private void clearTextfields()
      Clears all contents from all TextFields.

    • areInputDataValid

      private boolean areInputDataValid()

    • exportPatientData

      private void exportPatientData(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Patient> selectedPatients) throws Exception
